strapiPost.title: Happy Anniversary CB!
strapiPost.photoCredit: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiPost.content:
Today is the official day marking Crystal Bridgesâ€™ 10 year anniversary! Though the museum has already had a special exhibit to celebrate, starting today there will be 4 days of festivities for the occasion. 

  • Cheers: Today through Sunday there will be live music in the lobby, the Symphony of Northwest Arkansas will be playing in galleries, it will have a speakers series, and other family friendly activities.
  • From the beginning: After two years of being open, visitors of Crystal Bridges had surpassed one million people, and there have been no signs of attendance slowing. 

Learn more about the celebratory events HERE.
